 Windlord/Termitron:

Windlord continued fightting bravely in spite of his =
damage. He wasn't sure if he would survive and with his mind said farewell =
to his friends and beg at Primus that let they survive. Their enemies conti=
nued attacking him, while he tried to avoided the attacks and his cicuits w=
as telling him that he would fall in stasis, but he continued fightting "Un=
til I fell death" thought the male "I'll continue fightting, just the cowar=
ds... quits"

Windlord fired 15 times against Banzai-tron, 5 shots against =
McGowan; Stiller's arrow hurt him in one of his wings, and he shot  5 again=
st Stiller.

"BY THE ROYALTY!!!!!!!" screamed Termitron showing that he wou=
ldn't give up, and in spite of  his wounds he continue shotting; Termitron =
receive several Barrymore's shot and the bug-bot fired against him 5 times;=
 after that, Termitron fired 5 times against ALba. Termitron looked the fir=
e ball the Lee shot against him and he felt 1 of the Depp's shots, avoiding=
 them and after that he fired 5 times against him and 5 against Depp.
